member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerDataSourceSettings.ArithAbort
member.summary: Terminates a query when an overflow or divide-by-zero error occurs during query execution.
member.remarks: Microsoft recommends setting ArithAbort=On for all connections. To avoid an additional round-trip to the server, do this at the server level instead of at the connection level.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerDataSourceSettings.XactAbort
member.summary: Rolls back a transaction if a Transact-SQL statement raises a run-time error.

member.summary: This contains the connection options that are currently in effect.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiNullDefaultOff
member.summary: ANSI_NULL_DFLT_OFF. Alters the session's behavior not to use ANSI compatibility for nullability. New columns defined without explicit nullability do not allow nulls.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiNullDefaultOn
member.summary: ANSI_NULL_DFLT_ON. Alters the session's behavior to use ANSI compatibility for nullability. New columns defined without explicit nullability are defined to allow nulls.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiNulls
member.summary: ANSI_NULLS. Controls NULL handling when using equality operators.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiPadding
member.summary: ANSI_PADDING. Controls padding of fixed-length variables.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.AnsiWarning
member.summary: ANSI_WARNINGS. Controls truncation and NULL in aggregate warnings.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.ArithAbort
member.summary: ARITHABORT. Terminates a query when an overflow or divide-by-zero error occurs during query execution.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.ArithIgnore
member.summary: ARITHIGNORE. Returns NULL when an overflow or divide-by-zero error occurs during a query.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.ConcatNullYieldsNull
member.summary: CONCAT_NULL_YIELDS_NULL. Returns NULL when concatenating a NULL value with a string.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.CursorCloseOnCommit
member.summary: CURSOR_CLOSE_ON_COMMIT. Controls behavior of cursors after a commit operation has been performed.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.DisableDeferredConstraintChecking
member.summary: DISABLE_DEF_CNST_CHK. Controls interim or deferred constraint checking.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.NoCount
member.summary: NOCOUNT. Turns off the message returned at the end of each statement that states how many rows were affected.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.NumericRoundAbort
member.summary: NUMERIC_ROUNDABORT. Generates an error when a loss of precision occurs in an expression.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.QuotedIdentifier
member.summary: QUOTED_IDENTIFIER. Differentiates between single and double quotation marks when evaluating an expression.

member.name: P:Tortuga.Chain.SqlServer.SqlServerEffectiveSettings.XactAbort
member.summary: XACT_ABORT. Rolls back a transaction if a Transact-SQL statement raises a run-time error.
